pageContent: Aim/background: The aim of this study was to evaluate the feasibility and efficacy, in terms of overall survival, of intensified upfront systemic therapy in patients with metastatic hormone-sensitive prostate cancer who lived in rural Nordland County, Norway.

metaData.source:
Prostate cancer--some aspects of epidemiology, risk factors, treatment and survival
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/3510459/
